entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
